tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: I really enjoyed this class. Just go to every class. Take notes and ask questions if you don\'t understand she is more than willing to explain things multiple times.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Do not ever take her, she is very unorganized and unclear, I wish I knew about her before I had her. She made the material bad granted she is nice and kind of cool but her teaching style is bad. She needs help to teach I did well in her class but she barely makes sense to the point you laugh in class every week because its a waste of time avoidher

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: I\'m already not good with math and this professor cemented my hatred for it 100%. The work is hard and she gets sidetracked very easily. She gave a group presentation project in a stats class. A STATS class. The only redeeming quality is that she allows a make up exam at the end of the semester, although it starts 10 min after the final.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Chellie is awesome! I\'m not sure if these other people had the same Chellie I did, but mine was awesome. Yes, she gets sidetracked during class every now and then, but it\'s a stats class! I want to talk about other things for a few moments! Her exams are very tough, but she grades very nicely.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Professor Shelley is tough but in a good way. She made psych stats fun and I really enjoyed going to class. I took this over the summer and it was intensive, and she made it worthwhile. She gives amazing explanations and knows how to teach. If you are a lazy student, then she is not for you. Study hard and work hard you will do well. FAIR GRADER :)

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: THIS IS THE ABSOLUTE WORST PROFESSOR I HAVE EVERY TAKEN IN MY COLLEGE CAREER. WAY TO DEMANDING OF HER STUDENTS. SHE HAS A 5 PAGE LENGTHY UNNECESSARY SYLLABUS. WAY TO MUCH WORK AND DOES NOT CARE FOR HER STUDENTS MUCH. NO WIGGLE ROOM AT ALL IN REGARD TO ANYTHING. SHE OVER-COMPLICATES AND OVERBURDENS STUDENTS IN A COURSE THATS DIFFICULT TO BEGIN WITH

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: She\'s not the best prof, but she\'s also not the worst. She\'s pretty disorganized at times and gets side-tracked easily, but she\'s pretty lenient when need be. There\'s a bonus project and she does manage to find you points in the tests when you thought you bombed. She\'s really sweet, and idk if I would recommend, but she\'s chill. Give her a shot.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Let me just start with the fact that this class is excruciatingly hard. It is not a class you can just breeze through. If you stick with it, you will pass or maybe a B. She is very helpful and you had to make sure that you are proactive with her. Just stick with it and maybe she\'s give extra credit or curve the exams..

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: She\'s nice, but nice doesn\'t mean squat if it doesn\'t help you pass. You\'re going to have to work really hard because sitting in class you learn somewhat, but not enough to actually know what\'s going on. Disorganized and needs to give practice tests. Stop wasting class time talking about your life or random things. I study, but not it\'s not enough.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: This class was *not* hard. She taught the material well w/a passion. You need to come to class every day (b/c you *are* in college, not elementary school), write down *everything* she says, print out the lectures, understand everything, and *study* (i.e. memorize) them. Most students complain about her b/c they don\'t study.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: This professor is a lot of fun. She\'s so funny! BUT there is A LOT of material to cover & she moves FAST. You can\'t screw off. Her tests are from her lectures so PRINT her online lecture notes and fill them in during lectures. Review notes daily. Use the book only as needed. Her exams are fill in the blank, so STUDY LECTURE NOTES well.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Will not need the textbook, tests come from the notes (sometimes word for word). 3 hard exams (mostly short answers, rarely any multiple choice questions). One cumulative final, group project at the end of the semester. Homework will be from aplia(online which you will need to buy). Put effort and you will be fine.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: She is nice, but can\'t teach well at all. She teaches the lesson in the last 10 minutes of class, and rambles on about her day for the first 1.5 hours. Her tests are very long, and she talks for the first 15 minutes of test days about things not relevant to the class/test (her commute, her dog, etc.), which wastes time. Would not recommend.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: nice person just so wacky and all over the place. she would talk about nonsense then teach a whole lecture in the last 10 minutes. it was impossible to learn all her information and she gives a lot!!. screw aplia! took up so much time and her tests were impossible to pass even if you studied. AVOID if you are not an A+ kinda student Lab is cool tho

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE!! Worst Prof i have EVER had. Makes absolutely no sense at all and her test are IMPOSSIBLE. Even if she is the last prof on the planet and you must take this class find a way to avoid her. Never have i met a Prof who was so clueless and demanded so much of her students.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: the work load in this class is UNREAL. each test is 2 tests, tons of online work and a pointless group project at the end IN ADDITION TO a cumulative final. Terrible professor. Makes a simple topic INCREDIBLY difficult. avoid.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: i dont care what any commenets below state but i think this is a brilliant teacher whow just tends to add her corkiness and humor to the class. NO the class is not easy but if you do all the work then you will pass with flying colors. but just put your effort, participate and defenitly ask questions. she loves helping you if you honestlly work hard

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: HORRIBLE! I got an A but not through her help.. She is disorganized, scatter brained, and does not stop talking about nonsense! Plus she would answer emails and post material at odd hours like 2:00am the night before class at 8:30am?!! how would a normal person possibly see that information in time for class? Very smart but horrible teacher

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: I was running a B+ all semester! b\'s and c\'s on the tests and A\'s on homeworks and labs. Last day of class we do a final project which my group and I did amazing! She LOST my write up and emailed me that she could not find it, gave me a 50 on the project and dropped me from B+ to c+, then emailed me that she was so sorry and that I was a great stu

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
